content.p: Cookies help us to give you the best experience on our website. You can change your cookie settings if you wish. Otherwise we'll assume you're OK to continue.OKSee our policy Your guide to the university's library discovery tool, NUsearch. NUsearch is your one-stop shop for searching our collections, accessing online resources, placing requests and managing your library account. NUsearch Browse our frequently asked questions and subject guides to help you get the most from using NUsearch. We're here to support you with searching and accessing our collections. Contact the Library Helpline by email, phone or live chat. All Libraries updates All upcoming events Help with finding, evaluating and managing information. Information skills Help with all aspects of the research lifecycle. Research support How to use materials for study, research and teaching. King's Meadow Campus Lenton Lane Nottingham, NG7 2NR Please see our Help and support page for telephone and email contact points
